commitResults.messageTitle: Level-0
Level-1
commitResults.messageBody:
Added CLI parsing of commands
in Cli.java. Currently, it just prints out what was typed into, apart from "bye" which stops the program

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-2
commitResults.messageBody: Added add and list all tasks functionality. Additionally, created TaskService interface, TaskService implementation and TaskServiceRepo

commitResults.messageTitle: Align switch-case block in CLI to follow code style
Added mark and unmarking of tasks as completed.
commitResults.messageBody: Tasks now have a done attribute which is set via markDone(status). TaskService supplies the status via CLI. Generic index verifier + aligner created to use across whole TaskServiceRepo class, also throwing IndexOutOfBoundsException if an invalid index is supplied.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modified add task behaviour
commitResults.messageBody: Tasks are now added by simply typing the task name, instead of calling the keyword add

commitResults.messageTitle: Added todo, event, deadline
commitResults.messageBody: Using keywords todo, event and deadline respectively, you can now add them. On success, the task status is now also printed including how many tasks are in the list. Tasks refer to todo, event or deadline. Added toString() methods for all of such classes. Without using a keyword, Bob now rejects the command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactored string array joining in Cli to join(). Added checks for invalid from, to and by args.

Improved test to accomodate for happy paths and common edge cases (no task name, using list command when its empty, no /by arg for deadline, no /from and /to for event) Added handling of when list command is used if there are no tasks
Moved all java files into a single package called bob, updated test scripts to reflect changes
commitResults.messageBody: todo: Package all java files into relevant packages

commitResults.messageTitle: Placed classes etc in appropriate packages, fixed test script to work with current packaging, fixed README.md
Merge pull request #1
commitResults.messageBody:
branch-A-Packages

Packaged classes etc into proper packages

commitResults.messageTitle: Included proper formatting use for error messages
Merge pull request #2
commitResults.messageBody: Included proper formatting use for error messages

commitResults.messageTitle: Added app specific exceptions for repo indexing exceptions, modified exception messages, refactored command syntaxes, used exceptions for all invalid inputs except only if user only use one word for invalid commands, updated test, improved readability
Merge pull request #3
commitResults.messageBody: Added app specific exceptions for repo indexing exceptions, modified exception messages, refactored command syntaxes, used exceptions for all invalid inputs except only if user only use one word for invalid commands, updated test, improved readability

commitResults.messageTitle: Added delete functionality for tasks, modified fetchtask() to return Task type, updated input test for coverage against edge case
Updated fetch() and remove() to reflect repo is more generic
Added file-saving capabilities
